Properties.string:
local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true
p = {}
Tool = script.Parent
local WoodWalk = Instance.new("Sound") WoodWalk.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11387922" WoodWalk.Volume = .7 WoodWalk.Parent = Tool.Handle
function setTrans(root, trans, character) if (root:IsDescendantOf(character) == false and root ~= character) then return end local c = root:GetChildren() for i=1,#c do setTrans(c[i], trans, character) if (c[i].className == "Part" and c[i]:IsDescendantOf(character)) then -- concurrency hell p[c[i]] = c[i].Transparency c[i].Transparency = trans end end end
function resetTrans() WoodWalk:Stop() for k,v in pairs(p) do k.Transparency = v end end
function SetTransparency(root, trans, character) p = {} setTrans(root, trans, character) WoodWalk:Play() end
function staffUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,0,-1) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,1,0) end
function staffOut() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(.0976, .00976, -.995) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(.195, -.981, .00952) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(.976, .195, .0976) end
function isTurbo(character) return character:FindFirstChild("TreeHelm") ~= nil end
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local trans = .94 if (isTurbo(character) == true) then trans = .97 end
staffOut() wait(.5) staffUp() print(Tool.Parent, " ", character) SetTransparency(Tool.Parent, trans, character) wait(8) resetTrans() wait(3)
Tool.Enabled = true
end
function onEquipped() Tool.Handle.EquipSound:play() end
function onUnequipped()
resetTrans()
end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
wait(1) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" enabled = true
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)
